page.title: 11Media In Bognor Regis
page.content: There are three local papers in Bognor Regis all of which are in London Road the "Fleet Street" of Bognor Regis.The Observer is the largest local paper.It has 52 pages .The Guardian is the smallest and it is mostly advertisments.The Observer has more news and like the Post is good for sport,Entertainment and weekend TV.The Observer has many more photos than the other two and is more interesting to read. The Post costs 12p and the others are delivered free. Bognor recieves BBC1 BBC2 TVS and Channel 4 programmes all national (BBC) radio programmes and BBC radios Solent and Sussex. It also receives programmes from Radio Victory and Southern Sound.
